page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT IN HARROGATE
page.content: Harrogate has a total population of around sixty five thousand.There is very little manufacturing industry in Harrogate,and so most people of working age are employed in the service industries.the exact figures are:3% of the working population are employed in primary production(farming and quarrying),22% are employed in manufacturing and building,and the rest are employed in shops,hotels, offices,professional and scientific work and in employment associated with the exhibition and conference function of the town,for eg. in public houses, restaurants etc.Harrogate is dependent on tourists,conferences and shoppers. There are over five hundred conferences each year,keeping many of the people of Harrogate in work.
